summary: This document is an email chain from July 28, 2021, regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case. It includes a forwarded message indicating that an Acting AAG will return a call from Congresswoman Frankel, and a separate message confirming the trial date for Maxwell is November 29, 2021.

persons.name: Frankel
persons.context: A U.S. Congresswoman who is being contacted by the Acting AAG regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Trial Date Set
events.description: The trial date for the Ghislaine Maxwell case is confirmed as November 29, 2021.

keyFacts: The trial date for Ghislaine Maxwell was confirmed as November 29, 2021.
An Acting AAG (likely Acting Assistant Attorney General) was scheduled to return a call to Congresswoman Frankel regarding the case.
The correspondence originates from the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
